holes.original_proof:
simp_all [dist_eq_norm, EuclideanSpace.norm_eq, Real.norm_eq_abs, abs_mul, abs_of_nonneg, le_of_lt]
norm_num at *
try norm_num
try linarith
try
  {cases' le_total 0 (x 0) with h₉ h₉ <;> cases' le_total 0 (x 1) with h₁₀ h₁₀ <;>
      simp_all [abs_of_nonneg, abs_of_nonpos, le_of_lt] <;>
    nlinarith
}

simp_all [Metric.mem_closedBall, dist_eq_norm, EuclideanSpace.norm_eq, Real.norm_eq_abs, abs_mul, abs_of_nonneg,
  le_of_lt]
